EmailTemplate.name: 25/06/2014 Year 6 Assembly
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to Year 6 Leaving Assembly
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are invited to attend Year 6 Leaving Assembly on Friday, 4th July 2014 at 1:00pm. Followed by BBQ and a fun rounders match on the pitch.
Please RSVP by 30th June 2014 via the online form in the link below.
Online RSVP form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/10vII1Vd8bw5hNTO4JWengUfSbZc_pZb84kxx8oX3VRs/viewform)
Invitation to Year 6 Leaving Assembly (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xbGI4cFZ6NkEtd0k/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards,
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
